body_html: Oh, while static seq2seq will be deprecated, the sequence_loss functions will stay (we might just move them to another module). I'm therefore reopening this. alrojo -- maybe instead of improving the seq2seq module you could put these functions in a new module, maybe tf.contrib.seq2seq? That one could be fully dynamic and ultimately (but before TF 1.0) replace seq2seq. Does this sound ok? Great thanks for your CLs, they help a lot!

body: Oh, while static seq2seq will be deprecated, the sequence_loss functions will stay (we might just move them to another module). I'm therefore reopening this. alrojo -- maybe instead of improving the seq2seq module you could put these functions in a new module, maybe tf.contrib.seq2seq? That one could be fully dynamic and ultimately (but before TF 1.0) replace seq2seq. Does this sound ok? Great thanks for your CLs, they help a lot!
